abstract: If you find yourself dragged away from the TV during your team’s game, you can easily get the current score.
snippet: If you find yourself dragged away from the TV during your team’s game, you can easily get the current score.
lead_paragraph: It is full crunch time for professional football, but if you find yourself dragged away from the TV during your team’s game, you can easily get the current score. Just fire up Google on your mobile phone or computer and type in “New York Giants score” or “Saints score” and hit the Search button. The top result should be the current score, courtesy of www.nfl.com. If there’s not a game in progress, you get the final score of the team’s last match and the date and time for its next one.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: A Quick Way to Find N.F.L. Scores Online

abstract: Investors worried about the economic downturn have sold technology stocks almost indiscriminately.
snippet: Investors worried about the economic downturn have sold technology stocks almost indiscriminately.
lead_paragraph: Investors worried about the economic downturn have sold technology stocks almost indiscriminately. They haven’t given leading companies like Microsoft, Apple or Google enough credit for their conservative balance sheets, which make their stocks look downright cheap.

headline.main: Lack of Respect for Tech Giants
headline.print_headline: Lack of Respect for Tech Giants

byline.original: By Robert Cyran and Martin Hutchinson

abstract: It looks like the top Google executives have a fighter jet. The runway is next to the office.
